definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: One of the Fangs' greatest strengths is personal charisma.
sentences.chinese: 银牙们的一个巨大能力是超凡的个人魅力。

sentences.english: Please bear with me while I tell you the story.
sentences.chinese: 超凡英语学习网请耐心等我把这个故事说完。

sentences.english: It is a sort of natural canonization.
sentences.chinese: 死亡是一种自然而然的超凡人圣。

sentences.english: I’m writing to recommend to you the outstanding personality of Miss Jiang Junlei.
sentences.chinese: 我写此信旨在向您推荐姜君蕾女士的超凡个性。

sentences.english: Extra-wide screen TV set. Novel enjoyment above the rest.
sentences.chinese: 超宽屏幕电视机，超凡绝俗新享受。

sentences.english: The supernal ideology will not coexistence with the everyman.
sentences.chinese: 超凡的思想是不会与凡夫俗子共存的。

sentences.english: Today he seemed truly touched by divine spirit, which spiritualized and elevated him .
sentences.chinese: 今天，他似乎真正得到了圣灵的造化，超凡如圣了。

sentences.english: I feel she is a profound inner calm, crystal purity, exceptional off world.
sentences.chinese: 我感到她内心的宁静深远，晶莹纯洁，超凡脱世。

sentences.english: He is a man of great might.
sentences.chinese: 他是具有超凡力气的大力士。

sentences.english: She was gifted with literary brilliancy while she shouldered the responsibility of supporting her family.
sentences.chinese: 她禀赋超凡的文才，又肩负着家庭生活的重担。

sentences.english: Forget the charisma and the polished speeches.
sentences.chinese: 忘掉所谓的超凡魅力和精心润色的演讲吧。

sentences.english: Fishing people immersed in the flowers, there is an extraordinary feeling refined.
sentences.chinese: 钓鱼人沉浸在鸟语花香里，有一种超凡脱俗的感觉。

sentences.english: He had a certain charisma that inspired people and motivated people to perform.
sentences.chinese: 他有某种超凡的魅力来激发人们，推动人们做出表现。

sentences.english: Dust produces otherworldly landscapes, such as distinctively pitted terrain.
sentences.chinese: 沙尘形成许多超凡的地理景观，例如多孔隙的地面。

sentences.english: To err is human, to forgive is divine.
sentences.chinese: 犯错乃人之常情，宽恕则超凡入圣也。

sentences.english: On several other occasions Samson displayed this unusual power God had given him.
sentences.chinese: 参孙还在其他场合展示这种超凡的力量。

definition: out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
out of the ordinary/out of the common run
to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
